faqs.question: How do I log into the Student Portal?
faqs.answer: Visit the login page, enter your registered email/username and password, then click 'Login'. If you encounter issues, use the 'Forgot Password' option.

faqs.question: Can I change my course after registration?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can request a course change by contacting the Academic Office within the first two weeks of the semester.

faqs.question: Where can I download my results?
faqs.answer: Your results will be available under the 'Results' tab in the Student Portal after they have been officially released.

faqs.question: Is there a mobile app for the portal?
faqs.answer: Currently, we are working on a mobile app. Meanwhile, you can access the portal through your mobile browser.

faqs.question: How do I access the e-Library?
faqs.answer: Simply log into the Student Portal, navigate to 'E-Library', and browse or search for available resources.

books.title: Adobe Photoshop CC Classroom in a Book
